content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal preferences or emotions, but I can provide you some information about the song that is loved by the fans. "Love It When You Call" is a popular hit by The Feeling that was released in 2006 as a lead single from their debut album "Twelve Stops and Home". The song features catchy guitar riffs, upbeat rhythms, and sing-along choruses that make it a fun and enjoyable tune. It was a commercial success in the UK, where it peaked at number 18 on the UK Singles Chart and became one of the band's most recognizable and well-loved tracks. The song's popularity was helped by its inclusion in various TV shows, films, and commercials, as well as its frequent radio airplay.
